sentence.Network_en: Wonderfully melodic and tuneful, his songs have made me weep.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的歌旋律优美、悦耳动听，让我潸然泪下。

sentence.Network_en: A term in prison will concentrate his mind wonderfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 一想到要被判刑，他的头脑就会变得非常清醒。

sentence.Network_en: The terracotta tiled floor gives the place a wonderfully homely character.
sentence.Network_cn: 陶瓦地板使这个地方给人一种非常舒适温馨的感觉。

综合英语单词表(第二册上) - 豆丁网 ... wizened a. 干瘪的； 干枯的 wonderfully ad. 令人惊叹地， 极其 wrinkled a. 布满皱纹的.

list.abs: The ship is behaving wonderfully ., 轮船的运行状态极佳.
The undead as a wonderfully utilitarian cultural symbol ., 不死人也是一个非常实用的文化象征.
their life together has been wonderfully happy ., 他们在一起的生活极为幸福.
i am talked which you dance wonderfully good ., 我听说你的舞跳得特棒.
i amtold that you dance wonderfully well ., 我听说你的舞跳得特棒.

entry.def: If you describe something or someone as wonderful, you think they are extremely good.

example.ex: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face...
example.tran: 雾蒙蒙的寒冷空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

auth_sentence.content: But there are far too many wonderfully potent moments.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there are far too many wonderfully potent moments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there are far too many wonderfully potent moments.

auth_sentence.content: A wonderfully mature assessment which repays quoting in extenso.
auth_sentence.res_content: A wonderfully mature assessment which repays quoting in extenso.

auth_sentence.content: Not to mention a narrative of wonderfully un-Fordian cohesiveness.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not to mention a narrative of wonderfully un-Fordian cohesiveness.

sentences.en: a wonderfully spontaneous performance of the symphony
sentences.cn: 交响乐团精彩的即兴表演

sentences.en: She was always wonderfully kind to me.
